by photocopying recording or otherwise translated or altered without prior permission in writing from the author © 2021 by faye simple color change do a slip knot on the next yarn that you are using and pull it through just like doing a single_crochet bl = back loop © 2021 by faye decrease through back loop poke hook into the next poke hook into 1st loop back loop to enlarge it then into the 2nd loop then remove hook which was previously enlarged there you have it a decrease through back loop © 2021 by faye w o l l e y m r a w e g n a r o t h g i r b e t i h w abbreviation * = repeat r = row magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet bbl = back loop increase = increase decrease = decrease slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch cc = color change fo = fasten_off © 2021 by faye closing remaining stitches draw the thread poke needle through through front loops of the center all remaining stitches pull firmly through the to secure it poke other end the needle through the same place the yarn came out and pull it firmly through again © 2021 by faye body © 2021 by faye ears ch4 slip_stitch into the 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in the next st and double_crochet into the last st back yarn thread front yarn thread width of each ears space apart both ears © 2021 by faye right wing ch4 slip_stitch into the 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch again into the next st ch4 slip_stitch into the 2nd chain from hook 1sc half_double_crochet half_double_crochet into the very first 2nd chain double_crochet x2 into the very 1st chain photo of chain 4 very first 2nd chain very 1st chain end look © 2021 by faye left wing ch6 slip_stitch into the 2nd chain from hook decrease x2 ch3 slip_stitch into the 2nd chain from hook sc1 into the next half_double_crochet into the very 1st chain double_crochet into the same very 1st chain very 1st chain how it will look last step finish look © 2021 by faye right wing placement a b 1 space 1 space top yarn tail bobble cid 335 om yarn tail 1 row below & behind ears 1 row below top yarn tail 1 row above eyes le cid 332 wing placement a both yarn tails a 1 row below & behind ears 1 row above eyes pull through next st & poke into the same st hole b c © 2021 by faye mini feet ch3 half_double_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook sc1 feets placement front of the feet sew on mouth and
